entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload not working: Cannot update because an inferred delegate type has changed. #52270
  • New route analysers don't appear to support regex #52268
  • blazor.web.js missing from publish output #52266
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52264
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #52263
  • Perf regression: https, json #52262
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #52261
  • [.net 8][Blazor] <Navigating> tag is not working (or improve documentation) #52257
  • Blazor hosted webassembly NavigationManager NavigateTo causing client navigation instead of silent history.pushState #52256
  • Identity: Blazor: Setting Cookie.SameSite = SameSiteMode.Strict cause unexpected AuthorizationView behavior for external logins #52253
  • .Net 8 SDK - AddRazorRuntimeCompilation error - Index.cshtml not found #52248
  • dotnet new webapi template : package reference Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version isn't the last one #52246
  • .NET 8 Upgrade Causes Post-Logout Loop in Blazor Server App with Azure AD B2C #52245
  • net5 project can not run in iisexpress for visualstudio 17.8.0 #52254
  • Dynamic ports via code in runtime. #52244
  • Quarantine Http2RequestTests.GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #52238
    Test failures
  • dotnet user-secrets list --json outputs invalid json #52247

Closed

  • the ASPNetCore original API template project is missing the 'Store user accounts in-app' Authentication #11216
    Backlog
  • NET 8 Blazor Cookie Authentication and Authorization Policy not the same as in NET 7 #52222
  • Scaffolding command in official documentation is broken (on Linux, at least) #26524
    Backlog
  • Allow the parameterization of the DefaultIdentityUIPathPrefix value when using AddIdentityServerJwt() #21221
    Backlog
  • Allow configuration of 2FA Tokens clock skew (default 90s) #13347
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] UserManager inconsistencies in confirming tokens #12672
    Backlog
  • A suggestion to optimize the code of Identity scaffolding based on FxCopAnalyzers #9452
    Backlog
  • Unsafe Two Factor Recovery Codes #5815
    Backlog
  • RFC6238 AuthenticatorService #5811
    Backlog
  • Improve SignalR Backplane for small number of servers #48624
  • Provide updated Blazor Server template for .NET 8 #52227
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #52197
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52201
  • Net8.0 Router NotFound isn't called when an invalid page is entered in the addressbar #52251
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52191
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Error: No element is currently associated with component 0 #51393
    8.0.x
  • Schema URL in templated launchSettings.json should use HTTPS #51168
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Settings_MaxFrameSize_Larger_Server #41363
    Test failures
  • MultiplexEcho test failure #38087
    Test failures
  • HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Echo test failure #37943
    Test failures
  • Quarantine PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #38998
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_NoOrDelayed_Available_Ignored #41131
    Test failures
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.Http3.Http3RequestTests.GET_ConnectionsMakingMultipleRequests_AllSuccess #43374
    Test failures
  • Unskip MsQuic-dependent Tests on Debian12 When Available #46616
    Test failures
  • Hot Reload with dotnet-watch and Blazor WebAssembly fails on simple markup .razor changes with "No hot reload changes to apply." in .NET 7 and "not supported by the runtime" in .NET 8 RC2. #51781
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52243
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52225
  • Publish using Web Deploy has locking issues since .NET 8 #52149
  • Prueba #52241
  • Theme: Cloud Native #47240
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth
  • Fix #51636 (NavigateTo without enhanced nav) #52267
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly. #52260
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Stop retrying entire HTTP/3 test classes #52258
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    area-mvc, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Don't explicitly retry WebConfigAppendsHostingStartup_OutOfProcess #52259
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute" #52220
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Use HTTPS URLs for json.schemastore.org #52203
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK (9.0.100-alpha.1.23568.4) #52224
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine HttpClientHttp2InteropTests #52240
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #52239
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_NoOrDelayed_Available_Ignored #52237
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine GET_ConnectionsMakingMultipleRequests_AllSuccess #52236
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Unskip HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported on debian 12 #52235
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52232
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Fix radio button reset after submitting enhanced form #52219
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
